channel.title: Netflix shows
channel.description:
Hey everyone, a lot of us have netflix on our laptops and gaming systems and I just wanted to make a thread that we can post whats our favorite shows and or movies on it so others can see and share theirs.
My favorite show on it: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Reaper_(TV_series)#Planned_Plotline_for_Season_3]Reaper[/url] (its just amazing lol) My favorite movie on it: [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1105730/]Growing Op[/url] (really good story line)
So yeah, post your favorites. (:

item.title: Netflix shows
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“Mack n cheese, post:2, topic:395503”]I was gonna say Reaper, but you already put it. That show is amazing <3

Dexter is good too[/quote]
Yeah Dexter is amazing too, I love watching HBO shows on it. makes me not feel so broke

Read full topic

Anyways, favorite movie is Boondock Saints.
